messages.text: Alright, I figured it out. In virtualized environments freebsd seems to disable the tsc timekeeper which in turn disables the clock fastpath

messages.text:
Although I'm busy with the CI of FreeBSD itself and recently the migration from svn to git, I'm trying to keep tracking the projects have FreeBSD CI and try to collect their needs and suggestions.
<https://wiki.freebsd.org/3rdPartySoftwareCI>

messages.text: I used to use Travis to test some packages on FreeBSD (in particular those with binary dependencies), but now I'm moving all my packages to Github Actions. Before Travis I used Cirrus for FreeBSD, but it was exceedingly slow

elements.text: I used to use Travis to test some packages on FreeBSD (in particular those with binary dependencies), but now I'm moving all my packages to Github Actions. Before Travis I used Cirrus for FreeBSD, but it was exceedingly slow
